support.title: Support OP Access
support.description: Permissions which are related to allowing support op access to this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Toggle Support OP Access for this server in the Support tab.

control.title: Control
control.description: Permissions which are related the servers power state or console.

console.title: Console
console.description: Allows the user to view the console logs for this server.

command.title: Run commands
command.description: Allows the user to send commands to the console. If the user does not have stop or restart permissions they cannot send the application's stop command.

start.title: Start
start.description: Allows the user to start this server.

stop.title: Stop
stop.description: Allows the user to stop this server.

restart.title: Restart
restart.description: Allows the user to restart this server.

subuser.title: Subuser
subuser.description: Permissions which allow users to manage other subusers assigned to the server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to list & inspect subusers assigned to this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to edit permissions assigned to other subusers.

create.title: Create
create.description: Allows the user to create additional subusers on this server.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Allows the user to delete other subusers on this server.

allocation.title: Allocation
allocation.description: Permissions which allow the user to manage all assigned IP:Port's to this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view all allocations assigned to this server. Users with any access to the server can always view the default allocation via the Details page.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to change the primary allocation.

startup.title: Startup Parameters
startup.description: Permissions which allow users to manage the server's configuration.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view the startup command and associated variables for this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to modify startup variables for this server.

database.title: Database
database.description: Permissions which allow users to manage MySQL databases for the server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view all databases associated with this server including the usernames and passwords for the databases.

update.title: Reset password
update.description: Allows the user to reset the passwords for databases.

create.title: Create
create.description: Allows the user to create additional databases for this server.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Allows the user to delete the databases from this server.

file.title: File Manager
file.description: Permissions which allow users to manage the files stored on a server through the File Manager or the SFTP Server.

sftp.title: SFTP
sftp.description: Allows the user to connect to the SFTP server.

list.title: List
list.description: Allows the user to list all files & folders on this server but not view file contents.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view the contents of existing files.

write.title: Write
write.description: Allows the user to update the contents of existing files for this server.

create.title: Create
create.description: Allows the user to create new files for this server.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Allows the user to delete files from this server in the file manager or SFTP.

archive.title: Archive
archive.description: Allows the user to compress files & folders in the file manager.

git.title: Git
git.description: Allows the user to use git actions (ie Cloning, Pulling).

steam_workshop.title: Steam workshop
steam_workshop.description: Allows the user to use the workshop downloader.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Permissions which allow the user to create automatic tasks that run periodically on the server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to list schedules & view a schedule's details including all of the assigned tasks.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to edit a schedule including all of the schedule's tasks. This will allow the user to remove individual tasks, but not delete the schedule itself.

create.title: Create
create.description: Allows the user to create a new schedule.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Allows the user to delete schedules from this server.

backup.title: Backup
backup.description: Permissions which allow the user to manage backups of the servers files.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view all backups for this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user lock/unlock backups to stop them from being automatically deleted to make room for future backups.

create.title: Create
create.description: Allows the user to create backups for this server.

delete.title: Delete
delete.description: Allows the user to delete a backup belonging to this server.

deploy.title: Deploy
deploy.description: Allows the user to deploy a backup to this server.

download.title: Download
download.description: Allows the user to download a backup belonging to this server.

details.title: Details
details.description: Permissions which allow the user to change the name that identifies the server in the panel.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view this server details.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to change this server name. This only allows the user to change the name the server is named in the panel, not in-game.

audit.title: Audit Log
audit.description: Permissions which allow the user to inspect all actions going on for this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view this server action logs. Note: This may contain information which could be locked behind other permissions.

fastdl.title: FastDL
fastdl.description: Permissions which allow the user to view the FastDL link or sync content to FastDL for this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to see the FastDL page for this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to sync FastDL content from this server.

scanner.title: Backdoor Scanner
scanner.description: Permissions which allow the user to scan the server's files for backdoors.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to use the Backdoor Scanner for this server.

mod.title: Mod Manager
mod.description: Permissions which allow the user to view & install one-click mods for this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view available one-click mods to install on this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to install one-click mods on this server.

modpack.title: Modpack Manager
modpack.description: Permissions which allow the user to install Minecraft Modpacks on this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view which modpacks are available for installation on this server.

update.title: Install
update.description: Allows the user to install a modpack on this server.

plugin.title: Plugin Manager
plugin.description: Permissions which allow the user to install Minecraft Plugins on this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view which plugins are available for installation on this server.

update.title: install
update.description: Allows the user to install a plugin on this server.

updater.title: Steam Updater
updater.description: Permissions which allow the user to update steamcmd based servers.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to use the Steam Updater for this server.

monitor.title: Health Monitor
monitor.description: Permissions which allow the user to use the manage the Health Monitor for this server.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view the status of server's Health Monitor.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to toggle the server's Health Monitor status.

reinstall.title: Reinstall
reinstall.description: Permissions which allow the user to trigger a re-installation for this server.

update.title: Update
update.description: Allows the user to reinstall this server.

license.title: License
license.description: Permissions which allow the to view the WISP instances license information.

read.title: Read
read.description: Allows the user to view the License information on the overview page.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Permissions which allow admins to customise the WISP instance.

update.title: Update
update.description: Ability to update instance settings.

migrator.title: Migrator
migrator.description: Permission to use the migrator system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read migrators.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update migrators.

announcement.title: Announcement
announcement.description: Permission to use the announcement system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read announcements.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update announcements.

application_api.title: Application Api
application_api.description: Permission to use the application api system.

read.description: Permission to read application apis.
read.title: Read

update.description: Permission to update application apis.
update.title: Update

database_host.title: Database Host
database_host.description: Permission to use the database host system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read database hosts.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update database hosts.

location.title: Location
location.description: Permission to use the location system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read locations.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update locations.

node.description: Permission to use the node system.
node.title: Node

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read nodes.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update nodes.

node_allocation.title: Node Allocation
node_allocation.description: Permission to use the node allocation system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read node allocations.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update node allocations.

user.title: User
user.description: Permission to use the user system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read users.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update users.

mod.title: Mod
mod.description: Permission to use the mod system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read mods.

update.title: install
update.description: Permission to update mods.

nest.title: Nest
nest.description: Permission to use the nest system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read nests.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update nests.

egg.title: Egg
egg.description: Permission to use the egg system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read eggs.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update eggs.

egg_variable.title: Egg Variable
egg_variable.description: Permission to use the egg variable system.

read.description: Permission to read egg variables.
read.title: Read

update.description: Permission to update egg variables.
update.title: Update

server.title: Server
server.description: Permission to use the server system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read servers.

server_database.title: Server Database
server_database.description: Permission to use the server database system.

read.title: Read
read.description: Permission to read server databases.

update.title: Update
update.description: Permission to update server databases.
